column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I was in Japan several years ago and have been looking for a ramen place I like
column2: and this is the most similar to what I had abroad
column4: toppings galore and that classic egg in the bowl. You can BYO ramen
column5: which is way too much work for me
column6: so I got the Tonkotsu spicy (not at all spicy) and my husband got the Tonkatsu black. Both of us preferred the spicy
column7: which somehow just tasted richer and fuller and had those satisfying thick noodles. You have the option to refill your noodles at the end for $2
column9: and the pork itself was delicious.
